display_long_description:
# **UPDATE: You can control your iPhone 📱 in VR using the Spatial Phone app!**

Finally figured out a way to control your iPhone in VR on your Meta Quest —  something that was previously only possible on Android.
 [media]

You can mirror and control your iPhone/Android phone directly onto your Meta Quest with high-quality passthrough and low latency. Use it in any app or game.

Note : iPhone needs to be paired with your Meta Quest each time you want to use the control feature. This is a limitation of the current technology and may be resolved in the future.

# Features:

**🔹 High-Resolution Passthrough**
[media]
Enjoy crystal-clear visuals of your Android/iOS device inside your Meta Quest headset with very low latency and stereo audio (40ms-90ms)

**🔹 Can be used with other apps/games**
[media]
 This app can be used in background with other app/games

**🔹 Control with Meta Quest Controllers**
[media]

**🔹 Easy to connect and private peer-to-peer connection**
[media]
Connect on the same network or internet without any custom setting. Your data stays private with end-to-end peer-to-peer connections. No additional data is collected or stored.



For additional help you can reach out on discord :  https://discord.gg/99qgmSxUZ9


[media]
Requirements : iPhone or Android 8+ are currently supported.

The companion software is free to download.

# **UPDATE: You can control your iPhone 📱 in VR using the Spatial Phone app!**

Finally figured out a way to control your iPhone in VR on your Meta Quest —  something that was previously only possible on Android.
 ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491825305_713821748209256_1811666983523177845_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=6Avs1bmDr0kQ7kNvwHgRETP&_nc_oc=Adn19agtThxLXsCLA_Eb_IjWX21RIXA1HsAv3vntUxHYoxzdFnt-i1mTzSy0N-DJLNo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=v3gLz27YFvaHURSDbkrAJA&oh=00_AfoicbrNszhsPZaHhtbU1M5kDzYr_owgQTA9ozng3RpRow&oe=696CFC5F)

You can mirror and control your iPhone/Android phone directly onto your Meta Quest with high-quality passthrough and low latency. Use it in any app or game.

Note : iPhone needs to be paired with your Meta Quest each time you want to use the control feature. This is a limitation of the current technology and may be resolved in the future.

# Features:

**🔹 High-Resolution Passthrough**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/491819281_1416266746061693_1950535190430581396_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LgpmmGhVHJYQ7kNvwHB9p71&_nc_oc=AdkQFMhieW6o0vO3tv2AEOu2hqy7ezctlqTL2gDF5uWvfh13bG_xYs7M3TOZXZ5TN7o&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfpQMkZNsKSM8GG4ConFDKvW0GkO4Rpig0hUEk7WorSQzg&oe=696CF294)
Enjoy crystal-clear visuals of your Android/iOS device inside your Meta Quest headset with very low latency and stereo audio (40ms-90ms)

**🔹 Can be used with other apps/games**
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822558_1485561759489852_7463739102511266467_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=lxejS8LDbXoQ7kNvwHWHakL&_nc_oc=AdkqRx_dpyB0PT6UWJJdPh_IPNAtlx1rrJPL_iEstZJXOtvq4EMR-iRuWL4_MJeweNo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=v3gLz27YFvaHURSDbkrAJA&oh=00_AfrK1jvqXLHPb0XfFQDWX5i9ZdO9DkKw5WfkYpgWQsaItw&oe=696D1381)
 This app can be used in background with other app/games

**🔹 Control with Meta Quest Controllers**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/499295509_1469651344483231_5722649313226420511_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9eQ6BRxaYfQQ7kNvwGONBF-&_nc_oc=Adm-6PxuYoF0_AbrxyOUrOEv-ncXMuibcThRotsHdUJc1QUYGbcm2RcaeKT61tBpVwY&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afpz-ACxd7F4X1SO9Hy1fB8hqr8QMBUtTcLrswQh6bIP5A&oe=696CFADC)

**🔹 Easy to connect and private peer-to-peer connection**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/499294745_705784255648705_5777747854196816471_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=G9rGygBrr58Q7kNvwFmKvSd&_nc_oc=AdnAEUBPfxLikUvlTgFaG7lfeldbIGVWiLbaXaKoqxQkQCkagfoANUZuFxrUusjpFPM&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfrFl2GZbIJzQgr5Mk5Qs4JzyYheDOxT6KqRSCJxhUNhdg&oe=696D0471)
Connect on the same network or internet without any custom setting. Your data stays private with end-to-end peer-to-peer connections. No additional data is collected or stored.



For additional help you can reach out on discord :  https://discord.gg/99qgmSxUZ9


![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/491819341_1367013977921682_3777894233403332618_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FmGT_zpp-rYQ7kNvwFLLyiQ&_nc_oc=AdkQQVYEi1hQxjlNRbbGYzZwtrI8-KyuK5ro2h5YY2qSTtQFQIeEnRq5BZvATf4bVpk&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfpYQ12b71D-q12v49Njk8O1fX7teRy7fGxO3eUH9ohFsw&oe=696D195D)
Requirements : iPhone or Android 8+ are currently supported.

The companion software is free to download.
